ygData.subject: Re: Web Update
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, I think I must apologize. I shot my mouth off too soon and now I feel like a horses butt. There are NO sites out there, other than the one posted that
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, I think I must apologize. I shot my mouth off too soon and now I feel
like a horses butt. There are NO sites out there, other than the one posted
that deal with trade skills in depth. Ya sure, there are trade skill guides
all over the place. But they are rarely updated and suck. That would be a
very cool thing is making a site where you have a team adding specific
detailed information for all the trade skills. Have a team for each one. That
I think could draw in a lot of traffic. Oh ya, what was that site again. Seem
to have lost it.

~Very sorry EQ player
